text:
dEqvatA# SaqtaBi#Shaq~g nakSha#traqmindrO# dEqvatA$ prOShThapaqdA nakSha#tramaqja Eka#pAd dEqvatA$ prOShThapaqdA nakSha#traqmahi#rbuqddhniyO# dEqvatA# rEqvatIq nakSha#traM pUqShA dEqvatA$ &Svaqyujauq nakSha#tramaqSvinau# dEqvatA# &paqBara#NIqrnakSha#traM ~MyaqmO dEqvatA#, pUqrNA paqScAd>1, yat tE# dEqvA ada#dhuH >2 || 28
(Palgu#nIq nakSha#traqM - ~Mvasa#vaq - straya#stri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
